title: PAYING (somewhat) RIDICULOUSLY HIGH PRICES FOR T206 TOUGHEST BACKS
author: forazzurri2axz

posts.post_title: PAYING (somewhat) RIDICULOUSLY HIGH PRICES FOR T206 TOUGHEST BACKS

posts.post_content:
Bill,

I have several on eBay right now, a Frank Chance Lenox SGC 10, a broadleaf 350 Jack Berry PSA 3, and a PSA 1 Overall uzit.  My email address is [url]bliztu@yahoo.com[/url].  I also have several other rare backs I'm willing to sell (another uzit, red Hindu, and several others).

Jared
Scratch that, just sold the Chance and Berry.  I still have a good number of rare backs though, all graded and the backs are all very clean.
